title: New: Allthingslost – Hold You Down
content:
I’ve just spent the last three or four hours checking out a bunch of new music from Australia, and it’s far to say that it’s easily the most exciting place for new music in the world right now.

Brisbane’s Allthingslost aka eighteen year old Abraham Tilbury is one of the many talents in a blossoming electronic scene, with new track Hold You Down showcasing a glimpse of his musical maturity. With touches of SOHN and James Blake, yet with elements of folk hidden amidst the songwriting, Hold You Down is an absolute gem, and hopefully the sign of even better to come.

Our hands are intertwined, the tears are almost broken,
The last words almost spoken.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
